issue.title: [C++] Rearrange code in bit-util.h/.cc for AppendWord
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8595](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8595). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
1. See if the optimizations for AppendWord (introduced in <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6985>) in the little endian case can be adapted to add parallelism to TransferBitmap.
1. Move CopyBitmap higher in the header file so it can be used for the BigEndian case.
